abstract: San Francisco's city attorney, Dennis Herrera, files lawsuit against Mission Street Development for failing to inform buyers its luxury condo Millennium Tower is sinking outside of predicted, safe ranges; 58-story 400-unit building, built in 2008, may be sinking faster than expected because its foundation is set in mud and clay rather than bedrock.

headline.print_headline: San Francisco Sues Over Sinking Skyscraper, Symbol of a Rush to Build
headline.main: San Francisco Files Lawsuit Against Sinking Millennium Tower

snippet: A luxury condominium is fast shaping into a huge legal battle involving developers, the city and owners, and one with stakes befitting Silicon Valley....
lead_paragraph: A luxury condominium is fast shaping into a huge legal battle involving developers, the city and owners, and one with stakes befitting Silicon Valley.
